name: International Conference on Management, Engineering and Social science-2020
content: One of the primary motives of the 2nd International conference on Management, Engineering and Social Science (ICMESS-2020) to be held in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, on the 10th - 11th of April 2020 is to spur unique discoveries in terms of countering conventional challenges faced in everyday engineering activities and technologies. Technology is progressing at a very fast pace, which currently is weighing heavily on the earth's bounty of natural resources and causing serious damage to the environment. The price for this large-scale and mass expansion in all forms of daily life is being paid for in the form of climate change. ICMESS-2020 will accepts papers from Following Domains: 1\. Engineering and Technology 2\. Applied Science 3\. Education and Technology 4\. Business and Management All accepted papers will be Published in Reputed Scopus Indexed Journals.
